speedhack.name: Speedhack
speedhack.description:
<cg>Toggle Speedhack</c> = <cl>C</c>
Slows down the game to the desired value, only works while recording a macro.

lock_delta.name: Lock-Delta
lock_delta.description: Slows down the game on frame drops to make sure no frames are skipped.

fps.name: Lock-Delta FPS
fps.description: The FPS value lock delta will use while enabled.

frame_stepper.name: Frame Stepper
frame_stepper.description:
<cg>Advance Frame</c> = <cl>V</c>
<cg>Disable</c> = <cl>B</c>
Lets you advance frame by frame for more precision.
